title: Panic as Bitcoin crisis escalates as value plunges in half and crypto geeks see entire fortunes vanish… or worse
description: When prices fall this fast, fortunes can vanish overnight - and some investors end up worse off than broke.

title: Bitcoin Surges Past $70,000 As Investors Buy The Dip From Historic Free Fall
description: Bitcoin climbed past $70,000 Friday, less than 24 hours after the crypto fell to prices not seen since before Donald Trump was elected in 2024.

title: South Korea crypto firm accidentally gives away £32bn in bitcoins to users
description: Bithumb apologises for mistake and says it has recovered 99.7 per cent of 620,000 bitcoins
